description: Approval of details reserved by condition 30 (Air Quality and Dust Management Plan (AQDMP)) of planning permission ref: 241397FUL dated 04.06.2025 for: Phased development for the construction of between ten and twenty storey mixed use development comprising: Part A - Purpose Built Student Accommodation (PBSA) with a ground floor flexible hub (Sui Generis); and Part B - Office floorspace with associated ground floor uses (Use Class E(g)(i)), together with related outdoor amenity spaces, landscaping, public realm improvements, cycle and DDA vehicle parking, refuse storage and ancillary and enabling works
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Exchange Plaza 58 Uxbridge RoadEalingW5 2ST
